SELECT
MIN(CASE to_char(A.TM, 'hh24') when #{info.index} THEN A.DRP END) AS #{info.drp},
A.STCD,MIN(A.DYP) AS DYP FROM (select R.STCD, R.TM, R.DRP,(CASE to_char(R.TM, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24') WHEN #{time} || '08' THEN R.DYP END) AS DYP FROM ST_PPTN_R R WHERE (to_char(R.TM, 'yyyy-mm-dd') = #{time} OR to_char(R.TM, 'yyyy-mm-dd') = #{tomorTime} AND to_char(R.TM, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24') >= #{time} || '08' AND to_char(R.TM, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24') <= #{tomorTime} || '07' AND R.STCD = #{stcd} ) A GROUP BY A.STCD

SELECT s.stcd,s.stlc,SUM(t.drp) AS tj FROM st_pptn_r t LEFT JOIN st_stbprp_b s ON t.stcd = s.stcd WHERE t.tm <= to_date(#{timeInterval}, 'yyyyMMddHH24') AND t.tm>=to_date(#{time} || '00','yyyyMMddHH24') AND t.stcd = #{stcd} group by s.stcd,s.stlc
SELECT s.stcd,s.stlc,t.dyp as tj FROM st_pptn_r t LEFT JOIN st_stbprp_b s ON t.stcd = s.stcd WHERE t.tm = to_date(#{timeInt}, 'yyyyMMddHH24') AND t.stcd = #{stcd}

SELECT s.stcd,s.stlc,SUM(t.drp) AS tj FROM st_pptn_r t LEFT JOIN st_stbprp_b s ON t.stcd = s.stcd WHERE t.tm <= to_date(#{nowTime}, 'yyyyMMddHH24') AND t.tm>=to_date(#{oldTime},'yyyyMMddHH24') AND t.stcd = #{stcd} group by s.stcd,s.stlc
SELECT s.stcd,s.stlc,t.dyp as tj FROM st_pptn_r t LEFT JOIN st_stbprp_b s ON t.stcd = s.stcd WHERE t.tm = to_date(#{nowTime}, 'yyyyMMddHH24') AND t.stcd = #{stcd}
